post.title: What is your personal definition of degeneracy?

body:
It needs a couple elements. (1) compulsive behavior, (2) a classic vice like gluttony, lust, anger, or sloth, and (3) acting on a desire to produce the same behavior in others whether they like it or not. 

A heroin user sitting in his living room and sleepily writing poetry wouldn't qualify, but a heroin user who laced his weed without telling someone he shared a joint with, would.
body_html:
It needs a couple elements. (1) compulsive behavior, (2) a classic vice like gluttony, lust, anger, or sloth, and (3) acting on a desire to produce the same behavior in others whether they like it or not.

A heroin user sitting in his living room and sleepily writing poetry wouldn't qualify, but a heroin user who laced his weed without telling someone he shared a joint with, would.

post.title: What is your personal definition of degeneracy?

body:
When I worked in a jail, I saw inmates break the rules, because they're inmates. No brainer. Some of them, when caught, would sheepishly admit, Yeah, I fucked up, my bad. Some actually seemed to feel guilt for their behavior if it caused someone else difficulty or harm. However, a small population would actually say to me, Well, you let it happen, it's your own fault. And I'd say, do you feel the same way about your victims? And they would admit that, Yeah, they **Let** me rob/rape/mug/sexually traffic/beat them, so that's on them. That's degeneracy. 

If you commit a crime, or you engage in any immoral behavior, that doesn't automatically make you a degenerate. Sometimes there are outlying circumstances. Poverty, hunger, desperation, thoughtless stupidity in the moment, depression, drug use...there are a lot of reasons why someone might act in ways outside of societal norms. If, however, after the fact (or when you sober up), you feel no remorse at all, and blame your victim for it, and have no problem doing it again without any remorse, then you are a degenerate. 

If your sexual fetish causes no harm to anyone else, I'm okay with it, as long as you keep me out of it. But if your fetish in any way causes another person harm, and you have no intention of stopping, you are a degenerate. 

If you know what you're doing is immoral/harmful and you deliberately try to get others to engage in that behavior with you, knowing its harmful, you are a degenerate. (drug pushers/ dealers, sexual exploitation etc)
body_html:
When I worked in a jail, I saw inmates break the rules, because they're inmates. No brainer. Some of them, when caught, would sheepishly admit, Yeah, I fucked up, my bad. Some actually seemed to feel guilt for their behavior if it caused someone else difficulty or harm. However, a small population would actually say to me, Well, you let it happen, it's your own fault. And I'd say, do you feel the same way about your victims? And they would admit that, Yeah, they Let me rob/rape/mug/sexually traffic/beat them, so that's on them. That's degeneracy.

If you commit a crime, or you engage in any immoral behavior, that doesn't automatically make you a degenerate. Sometimes there are outlying circumstances. Poverty, hunger, desperation, thoughtless stupidity in the moment, depression, drug use...there are a lot of reasons why someone might act in ways outside of societal norms. If, however, after the fact (or when you sober up), you feel no remorse at all, and blame your victim for it, and have no problem doing it again without any remorse, then you are a degenerate.

If your sexual fetish causes no harm to anyone else, I'm okay with it, as long as you keep me out of it. But if your fetish in any way causes another person harm, and you have no intention of stopping, you are a degenerate.

If you know what you're doing is immoral/harmful and you deliberately try to get others to engage in that behavior with you, knowing its harmful, you are a degenerate. (drug pushers/ dealers, sexual exploitation etc)

post.title: What is your personal definition of degeneracy?

author.bio: Hi there, I'm Reverie, or Gray, whatever you prefer. I'm just here to look at memes and pretty pictures but sometimes I might comment on things. Sometimes my opinions, sometimes stupid thoughts, or both in one.
author.bio_html: Hi there, I'm Reverie, or Gray, whatever you prefer. I'm just here to look at memes and pretty pictures but sometimes I might comment on things. Sometimes my opinions, sometimes stupid thoughts, or both in one.

body: People who harm others, make their lives harder, or prevent them from enjoying harmless things, but then go to claim nothing was their fault or whatever 'allowed' them to do so.
body_html: People who harm others, make their lives harder, or prevent them from enjoying harmless things, but then go to claim nothing was their fault or whatever 'allowed' them to do so.

post.title: What is your personal definition of degeneracy?

body:
The usual stuff but shamelessly doing it public in a way that untainted people, especially children, are affected by their degeneracy. In my opinion, the highest form of degeneracy is actively and deliberately trying to push degenerate shit on children (grooming) or for example "drag queen reading time" in kindergarden. Absolutely disgusting and should be forbidden by law.

If you're a degenerate and you keep it to yourself and other degenerates, fine. But if you involve other people, especially children, you're trash.
body_html:
The usual stuff but shamelessly doing it public in a way that untainted people, especially children, are affected by their degeneracy. In my opinion, the highest form of degeneracy is actively and deliberately trying to push degenerate shit on children (grooming) or for example "drag queen reading time" in kindergarden. Absolutely disgusting and should be forbidden by law.

If you're a degenerate and you keep it to yourself and other degenerates, fine. But if you involve other people, especially children, you're trash.
